Blog.post: should i tell him or not?? but wad if i tell him, he'll get angry?? haiz.. confused now. in actual facts, a lot of things happen thes few days. but i did not tell him any. cos i noe i am a burden to him. and i myself take down everything. all the sadness by myself. and all these created my life to be stress..haiz.. he got his life, oso his fren's burden. adding mine into his life is too much for him.. i have gone overlimit too over limit tat i muz control. cos if i go on further, i noe i am gonna lose him. how???? no matter how many times he tell me tat i a not a burden. but i myself noe i am. and i jus keeps thinking tat way. he told me not to think so much. i jus cant. and i keeps thinking i am a burden to him. how?? haiz. do u think i am gonna lose him??? haiz.. tell him problems, still need him to help me find solution. this shows tat i am a trouble person. a veri demanding girl. if i tell him all tat, can he change back to who i am when i got to noe him at tat time?? can he??? i dunno.. tats y i am wondering should i tell him or not.. haizz.

heex..today quite a fun day..nth happens and i jus sleep and sleep until he wake me up..hahax..yeaaa..promise him tat i will go..and he realicalls me to wake me up!!!hahax..yeah yeah..went to visit him..he looks pale and bleh..dun wan talk bout him..hahax.. guess wads the suprise he prepared for me??hahax..a meal!! he cooked a plate of fried rice for me..hahx..his first ever using the kitchen utensils..hhax.quite taasty..cant give him full marks..if not he become arrogant..hahx. i guess i'm tired..so write till here!! bubbyyyeeeeee!! Lalalalalalala~~~

today ...hmm..how should i describe it.hhax..oso no idea how i pass the day..^^ hmm..go sch at 8.30am..then finish at 2.30..haiz..sianz sianz sianz..for 1 week..it is gonna be lidat..hahax. oh ya..today i actually veri guai..cos i gonna bring all my books..budden when i was tieng my shoelace..i left my books at home..hahahx.so funni..then reach sch first period is maths..din bring textbk..sum more forget to bring calculator...i might as well dun come for it..hahax..damn funni..hmm.got new teacher.call ms ng then wad melvin...wah..all teach maths..sianz.. wah.today then find out tat mrs wee is pregnant.hahax...she veri funni..say wad...we teach her the techniques then ask her watch many many prons then learn.then can get pregnant.hahax.reali get pregnant.ahahx. mr teo veri bad sia..his wife pregnant din tell me..hahax.go sch i wanna suan him ..hahax..and the report card..he's been looking for me.but i dun wan go find him..heex...dun wan take..sure all de way red. and whoa!!! our sch fertility veri gd sia..currently ..physically..got 14 teachers pregnant..so many...maybe our sch got the fertility angel..go round shooting them..hahax. hmm..dunno tmr wanna go out anot..sianz..i oso dun wan go watch harry potter..he veri wu liao..i c first larx..if i can wake up..then i go watch wif him.. hmm..dun wan..met him then change plan..hahahx.. okok..i end here ....byebiyaaa!!!! Lalalalalala~~~~~

today wake up early in the morning go for this course call reading rites..pay $5 go there yawn..din even listen to wad the exteranl speaker is speaking.hahax.but is reali tired and sum more in the air con room..who doesnt wan to sleep..hahax.in the end..mr tan saw tat no 1 is listening then he get fed up =| starts scolding us like mad cow.. =P but the worse is khai bin.hahax.the way mr tan scold him damn funni..cos he is a sissy..hahax.and i was luffing secretly..the external speaker is damn lousy..keeps praising herself..bleh bleh bleh..hahax.. while listening to her tok cock..we were chatting bout..and seow hui said tat if suwen goes to the lib 10 times..she will be kick out 9 times..if i go to the lib 10 times..i get kick out 7 times..so wad if me and suwen go to the lib together???? will our face be on the board WANTED??? hahahx..and we deicided to try it. =P in the MRT oso..everytime in the MRT..is like every1 can hear wad we r toking bout..tat time go to sentosa wif su wen..already got warn by the residents and oso the ppl -.-""" hahax..but who cares..jus wanna be myself.. =P these few days we will try it... today after the reading rites course..we went to play bowling..and met up wif waisheng they all..hahax..they all veri pro lehx..esp the wenkai and rong wei..they dun roll the ball..but throw it..i think the floor is gonna haf a big hole..hahahx..the finish playing bowling ..we went to play bliiard..they all looks immature and was stop...and i was able to get thru..and they told the ppl tat they r my frens..i got ask to show ID..-.-"" then i oso cant enter..wa lau..zz..then discman ear piece spoil..then go buy..haizz.. before we go play bowling..we went to haf out ear pierce..hahax.again..so fun..all so scare.keeps holding my hand like dunno wd sia..hahx.and i got the 5th and 6th ear piercing of mine..i told frens not to pierce in the middle of the ear..in the end ..i myself go pierce..hahahx..nvm larx..try try..all say pain pain..dunno wad they thinking sia..zz..like ant bite and they tell me pain..then i haf to fan them..-.-""" heex..and i saw him again..Lalala~~ and we chat and chat quite long..we haf a date..hahahx..this sat ..but dunno going a not..cos sat lehx..i wan sleep..-.-"" so overall..today is a fine fine day..or should i say a nice day??hmmm..anything will do..hahhax.kkz..update u next time..byebiya!! Lalalalala~~~~

haiz..now is 1.20pm wednesday...damn bored siaz..jus wake up.cant go back to sleep..HELP!!! deanson not online..charles oso nt online..like no 1 online lidat...sianz..nobody to chat wif.play neopets.almost play all the games already..hahax.. dunno when he comin..got lots of things to tell him and them..*humph* abandon me sia..such a "wonderful" frens rite??hhax..jkjk. 2 days din c him already..think went out ..nt sure oso..i look at the screen..screen look at me..hahax.like waiting to rot lidat..sianz.. now june holiday..the sch soo gd sia..need to go back to sch for onli 1 week..veri unbelievable lehx..hahax... so this means tat this june holiday i am veri free...yea!!! nowadays got lots of moive..all like veri nice..if go watch all the movies..sure bankrupt.. =X so might as well stay at home to rot..hahax..no larx..sleep all the way i think..nonono..still got sch holiday homework..cannot forget tat.. yesterday bought another basketball jersey..cost me RM129.90 wa lau..broke already..still got a lot of jerseys need to buy ..T.T i love my mama ..wahahax..go get some money frm her..heex =[ now arh..i think i change my style again..this yr is hip hop i think..hahax..frens say tat onli guys wear tat way..-.-"" but i find it nice yea??hahax..nvm..my taste.. haiz..wait and wait and wait..when he coming back arh??? sianz.. ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

well well well...finally got my blog..hahax..but 1 thing for sure i will abandon it in a few days later..hahax..cos i'm not reali in for it..but seems fun so i joined. =P jus wake up not long..so dunno wad my mind is thinking larx.. last monday jus finish my chinese 'o' level..sure die!! =X no matter how bad the situation is..still got 1 more chance.. =) these few days.. i think a lot.damn lots..and i found out wad i reali wan in my life..hahax..something stupid i would say..hahax.. ~~~~~~~Lalalala~~~~~~~write till here~~~~~~~Lalalala~~~~~~~
